snippet: A marathon effort to end the lockout grew tense and apparently broke down when the players tried to bring their union head, Donald Fehr, back into the talks.
abstract: Marathon effort to end the NHL lockout grows tense and breaks down after players attempt to bring their union head Donald Fehr back into the talks.
lead_paragraph: A marathon effort to end the lockout grew tense and apparently broke down when the players tried to bring their union head, Donald Fehr, back into the talks.

headline.seo: No Fehr? No Deal, Say N.H.L. Players
headline.main: No Fehr? No Deal, Say the N.H.L. Players
headline.print_headline: No Fehr? No Deal, Say the N.H.L. Players
